title: Sobekneferu
summary: Sobekneferu or Neferusobek (Ancient Egyptian: Sbk-nfrw) was a pharaoh of ancient Egypt and the last ruler of the Twelfth Dynasty of the Middle Kingdom.[lower-alpha 1] She ascended to the throne following the death of Amenemhat IV, possibly her brother and husband, though their relationship is unproven. Instead, she asserted legitimacy through her father Amenemhat III. Her reign lasted 3 years, 10 months, and 24 days, according to the Turin Canon.
